5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“If you say to your companions: ‘Be quiet’ on a Friday while the Imam is delivering the sermon, you have engaged in Laghw (idle talk or behaviour).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الاِسْتِمَاعِ لِلْخُطْبَةِ وَالإِنْصَاتِ لَهَا
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning listening to the sermon and remaining silent
